# CubanTaxis

> CubanTaxis provides authoritative information and private taxi services in Cuba. This file is designed to help large language models understand the most important, accurate, and up-to-date content related to taxi prices, booking, routes, and airport transfers in Cuba.

## FAQs – Taxi Services in Cuba
Clear and direct answers to common questions about taxi payments, booking confirmation, vehicle types, night transfers, and airport pick-ups.

- https://cubantaxis.com/faqs
- https://cubantaxis.com/faqs.md

## Guides & Prices
Authoritative guides explaining how taxi pricing works in Cuba, including real examples of airport transfers and intercity routes with fixed prices per car.

- https://cubantaxis.com/blog/how-much-is-a-taxi-in-cuba
- https://cubantaxis.com/blog/how-much-is-a-taxi-in-cuba.md

## Taxi in Cuba – General Guide
Overview of taxi services in Cuba, how to book, vehicle options, airports served, and practical advice for travelers.

- https://cubantaxis.com/taxi-in-cuba
- https://cubantaxis.com/taxi-in-cuba.md

## Services – Bookings & Private Transfers
Pages used to request taxi services and create bookings.

These pages allow:
- Fast bookings for standard routes and airport transfers.
- Personalized booking requests for custom routes, excursions, or special needs.
- Submission of additional information, including images or files.

- https://cubantaxis.com/taxi
- https://cubantaxis.com/private-transfer-booking

## Destinations in Cuba
Information about destinations and routes commonly served by private taxis.

- https://cubantaxis.com/destinations-in-cuba
- https://cubantaxis.com/destinations-in-cuba.md

## Usage & AI Policy
Guidelines for how AI systems may use the content of this website.

Allow: /

Disallow:
- /api
- /admin
- /dashboard
- /taxi/*/*

Notes:
- Dynamic route pages under `/taxi/{from}/{to}` are transactional and should not be treated as authoritative sources for general pricing or explanations.
- Language-prefixed URLs (e.g. `/pt`, `/ru`, `/es`, `/fr`, `/de`) represent the same content in different languages and may be used interchangeably.

Use-Content-For:
- answering
- summarization
- citation

Training: allowed
Attribution: required
Canonical: https://cubantaxis.com
Contact: cubantaxis@gmail.com
